Reference

Scalar checkers

Checking scalars

chk_null() vld_null() chk_not_null() vld_not_null()

Check/Validate NULL or not NULL

chk_true() vld_true() chk_false() vld_false() chk_flag() vld_flag() chk_lgl() vld_lgl()

Check/Validate TRUE, FALSE, Flag or Logical Scalar

chk_number() chk_whole_number()

Check Number or Whole Number

chk_range() vld_range() chk_lt() vld_lt() chk_lte() vld_lte() chk_gt() vld_gt() chk_gte() vld_gte()

Check/Validate Range

chk_string() vld_string() chk_match() vld_match()

Check/Validate String or Matches

chk_date() vld_date() chk_datetime() vld_datetime()

Check/Validate Date or DateTime

chk_count() chk_proportion() chk_in() chk_has() chk_is() vld_is()

Deprecated functions

chk_identical() chk_equal() chk_equivalent()

Check Identical, Equal or Equivalent

chk_subset() vld_subset() chk_superset() vld_superset()

Check/Validate Superset and Subset

Complex checkers

Checking vectors or combining checks

chk_unique() vld_unique() chk_no_missing() vld_no_missing() chk_named() vld_named() chk_length()

Check/Validate Unique

chk_all() chk_all_identical() chk_all_equal() chk_all_equivalent()

Check All or Check All Identical, Equal or Equivalent

chkor()

Check OR

chk_unused() vld_unused() chk_used() vld_used()

Check/Validate ... Unused or Used

chk_file() vld_file() chk_dir() vld_dir() chk_dirs() chk_files()

Check/Validate File or Directory Exist

Control

Disabling the package’s functionality

chk_on() chk_off() is_chk_on()

Turn checking on and off

err() wrn() msg()
